CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1958, pg. 2, reads: "Raps Burgess - Burgess Bernard Antol of Whitaker, and two of his police officers (flanking the burgess on the right) were told bluntly by Attys. Livingston M. Johnson (left) and Oliver L. Johnson (partly obscured) that they resent official borough action against John Minter Jr. in this police brutality case."
TitMainTitle: Attorneys Livingstone M. Johnson and Oliver L. Johnson on left, Burgess Bernard Antol in center, and Whitaker police officers Robert S. Faucett and Raymond Hovan charged with brutality, gathered in Alderman's office
